tool_description: Creates, manages, and evaluates alert rules for container monitoring with configurable conditions, thresholds, and notification settings.

rule_name.description: Unique name for the alert rule

metric_name.description: Name of the metric to monitor

condition.description: Alert condition: greater_than, less_than, equals, not_equals, contains

evaluation_window.description: Time window for evaluation in minutes (1-1440)

severity.description: Alert severity level: low, medium, high, critical

notification_channels.description: Notification channels: email, slack, webhook, pagerduty

enabled.description: Whether the alert rule is enabled

suppression_duration.description: Alert suppression duration in minutes after firing (0-1440)

error_messages: Duplicate rule name: Alert rule with this name already exists.
Invalid condition: Use one of [greater_than, less_than, equals, not_equals, contains].
Invalid evaluation window: Must be between 1-1440 minutes.
Invalid severity: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Invalid notification channel: Use only [email, slack, webhook, pagerduty].
Invalid suppression duration: Must be between 0-1440 minutes.
Rule evaluation failed: Unable to evaluate rule due to missing or invalid metric data.
usage: Specify rule_name, metric_name, condition, and threshold_value, optionally configure evaluation_window, severity, notifications, and other settings.

rule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created alert rule

rule_status.description: Status of rule creation: created, updated, failed

evaluation_count.description: Number of times rule has been evaluated

last_triggered.description: Timestamp when rule was last triggered

current_state.description: Current rule state: ok, alerting, suppressed
